name: EXTERNAL_ELIG_INFO
description: The EXTERNAL_ELIG_INFO table contains the external eligibility information returned by Rx Hub.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the external eligibility that is returned by RxHub.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The external eligibility type category number for the external eligibility information returned by RX Hub.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ELIG_V_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether external eligibility is active.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_ELIG_S_ID
columns.description: This is the unique ID of the external eligibility source returned by RxHub.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_MATCH_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether external eligibility has been user verified.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_NCPDP_ID
columns.description: Stores NCPDP value from Rx Eligibility responses into EPT 42021: EXTERNAL_ELIGIBILITY NCPDP VALUE.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_ID
columns.description: Cardholder ID for mail order

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_NAME
columns.description: Cardholder Name for mail order

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_GRP_ID
columns.description: Group ID for mail order

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_PCN_NUM
columns.description: Plan network ID returned from SureScripts

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_BIN_NUM
columns.description: Bin number returned from SureScripts

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_DEP_YN
columns.description: Whether member is a dependent of the coverage

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: Holds the PBM (Payor) name received on the e-prescribing eligibility response.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_LNAME
columns.description: Holds the cardholder last name as received from the e-prescribing interface.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_FNAME
columns.description: Holds the cardholder first name as received from the e-prescribing interface.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_MNAME
columns.description: Holds the cardholder middle name as received from the e-prescribing interface.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_CH_SUFFIX
columns.description: Holds the cardholder suffix as received from the e-prescribing interface.

columns.name: EXT_ELIG_GRP_NAME
columns.description: Holds the Group Name as received from the e-prescribing interface.
